00021   enum Component {RHOP     = 1,
00022                   RHO0     = 2,
00023                   RHOM     = 4,
00024                   NONRES   = 8,
00025                   SIGMA    = 16,
00026                   OMEGA    = 32,

00028                   RHO2S0   = 128,
00029                   RHO2SM   = 256,

00031                   F2       = 1024,
00032                   F0_1370  = 2048,

00034                   RHO17000 = 8192,
00035                   RHO1700M = 16384,
00036                   F0_1710  = 32768,
00037                   F0_1500  = 65536,
00038                   F2P1525  = 131072,
00039                   NRPW_PM  = 262144,
00040                   NRPW_M0  = 524288,
00041                   NRPW_0P  = 1048576};
00042                   
00043    static int allComponents() {
00044      return RHOP + RHO0 + RHOM + NONRES +
00045        SIGMA + OMEGA + 
00046        RHO2SP + RHO2S0 + RHO2SM +
00047        F0 + F2 + F0_1370 + F0_1710 +
00048        RHO1700P + RHO17000 + RHO1700M +
00049        F0_1500 + F2P1525 +
00050        NRPW_PM + NRPW_M0 + NRPW_0P;
00051    }
